original_text: If his offering be a burnt sacrifice of the herd, let him offer a male without blemish: he shall offer it of his own voluntary will at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation before the Lord.
korean_text: 그 예물이 소의 번제이면 흠 없는 수컷으로 회막 문에서 여호와 앞에 기쁘게 받으시도록 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: If his offering be a burnt sacrifice of the herd
let him offer a male without blemish
he shall offer it of his own voluntary will
at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation
